task: Identify mitochondrial genes (those starting with 'MT-' or 'mt-'), calculate the percentage of counts from these genes, and report summary statistics. Use the shape of the distribution and compute adaptive thresholds. Return a JSON object with fields: n_mt_genes (number of mitochondrial genes found), on_tissue_beads (total number of on-tissue beads/cells), mean_mt_percentage (mean percentage of mitochondrial counts), median_mt_percentage (median percentage of mitochondrial counts), std_mt_percentage (standard deviation of mitochondrial percentage).
